Pages: Blocks: Lines: Labels:
EDITOR MESSAGES --> Wrong day of week (you can choose 1-7) Bad color format. Please, use color editor Bad image ID format. Choose one from list Choose item from list or add one Edit mode is active. If you want do this, close this mode Moving mode is active. If you want do this, close this mode Labels will be sorted by align (first left, next center and right in the end) Bad number format. It must be an unsigned integer Choose label align Bad text size format. It must be an unsigned real number. Example: 10.5
To watch changes relaunch application Choose one page Press once again to close editor Import
